meta.title: Company «QPART»
meta.description: We provide metalworking services and manufacture parts and spare parts of any complexity. We perform work according to the customer's drawings or, if necessary, develop design and technical documentation from scratch. Finished products are shipped throughout Ukraine and abroad. We have experience working with foreign companies. ☎ +38 098 995 07 60.
meta.keywords: metalworking, QPART, manufacturing parts, CNC turning work, CNC milling work, heat treatment, metal casting

homePage.description: TURNING AND MILLING WORKS ON CNC MACHINES
homePage.descriptionCompany: We provide metalworking services and manufacture parts and spare parts of any complexity. We perform work according to the customer's drawings or, if necessary, develop design and technical documentation from scratch. Finished products are shipped throughout Ukraine and abroad. We have experience working with foreign companies.

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.title: TURNING PROCESSING
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.descriptionTop: We achieve what others call impossible. A large fleet of CNC machines, modern technologies, and a team of professionals allow us to manufacture parts of any complexity and volume.
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for a partner who can handle large batches, complex shapes, and tight deadlines? You found one.

infoCard.title: We perform any volume of turning work
infoCard.description: We understand that your business can't wait. Thanks to modern capabilities and streamlined logistics, your order will be completed as quickly as possible. Forget about long production times — we work fast and efficiently.

infoCard.title: Quick order completion
infoCard.description: Our fleet includes over 300 modern CNC machines that operate without interruption. We process large batches of parts with ease. If your suppliers can't handle the load, we are ready to take on your order and complete it on time.

infoCard.title: Precision and production of parts of any complexity
infoCard.description: Our machines can manufacture large parts with a diameter of up to 4000 mm and a length of up to 8000 mm. Need small, intricate parts starting from 10 mm? We’ll do it with maximum precision. Where others give up, we offer solutions and ask: 'When do we start?'

infoCard.title: Comprehensive Approach
infoCard.description: From processing to final finishing — we are ready to support your project at every stage. Our clients receive a complete solution: from turning operations to preparing parts for use.

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.callToAction: We are ready to become your reliable partner in turning works!

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.title: Metal Welding
zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.descriptionTop: Welding of any complexity becomes a reality thanks to our advanced equipment and innovative approaches. We ensure precision, strength, and reliability for every weld, regardless of the volume or type of metal.
zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Need quality welding? We are ready to help you bring even the most complex ideas to life.

infoCard.title: High precision and quality
infoCard.description: Our technologies ensure strong and reliable welds, even for complex metals and structures

infoCard.title: Fast order execution
infoCard.description: Thanks to an experienced team and high-tech equipment, we complete orders quickly and with great precision

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We provide a full cycle of welding services so that you receive a finished part without needing to contact other contractors

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.callToAction: Submit your application now and see what we can do!

porizkaNaVerstati.title: BANDSAW CUTTING
porizkaNaVerstati.descriptionTop: We offer professional metal cutting using CNC equipment, ensuring high work speed and impeccable results. Our solutions are ideal for processing large volumes of material, guaranteeing precision in every cut.
porizkaNaVerstati.descriptionBottom: Looking for a reliable partner for metal cutting? We are always ready to collaborate.

infoCard.title: Powerful equipment fleet
infoCard.description: We have more than 10 CNC bandsaws capable of cutting blanks with a diameter from 10 to 550 mm, ensuring flexibility and the ability to work with various types of metal

infoCard.title: Versatility in operation
infoCard.description: We have vertical bandsaws that allow for cutting long sheet blanks if necessary, expanding our processing capabilities

infoCard.title: High precision and speed
infoCard.description: We guarantee high cutting precision and fast order execution, saving time and ensuring accurate results

infoCard.title: Comprehensive service
infoCard.description: We offer a full cycle of metal cutting services, allowing you to receive finished parts without needing to contact other contractors

porizkaNaVerstati.callToAction: Submit your application now, and we will complete your order quickly and at the highest level!

lyttyaMetaluPage.title: Metal Casting
lyttyaMetaluPage.descriptionTop: Modern casting technologies help us manufacture complex and reliable parts from various materials. We ensure quality at every stage of production, guaranteeing compliance with the highest standards.
lyttyaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for specialists for complex cast parts? We will turn your idea into reality.

infoCard.title: Perfection and Long Service Life of Cast Products
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of metal casting services, including the production of complex parts for various industries. Thanks to our innovative solutions, you receive products with flawless precision, exceptional reliability, and long service life.

infoCard.title: Innovative Casting Technologies. Our capabilities include:

list.description: Low-pressure casting of high-temperature steels and non-ferrous metals

infoCard.title: Full Production Cycle
infoCard.description: We provide all stages, from the development of the technological process to the delivery of finished products. This ensures you receive products that meet the highest quality standards.

infoCard.title: Wide Selection of Materials
infoCard.description: We work with various types of metals, including high-alloy steels and non-ferrous alloys, to ensure the perfect result for any project.

lyttyaMetaluPage.callToAction: Submit an application today and receive products that meet your expectations and even exceed them!

frezerniRoboty.title: CNC MILLING PROCESSING
frezerniRoboty.descriptionTop: Our CNC centers can perform milling with high precision, even for the most complex parts. Professional expertise and modern equipment allow us to handle large batches and non-standard shapes.
frezerniRoboty.descriptionBottom: Looking for a partner you can trust with complex tasks? We are ready to work for your success.

infoCard.title: Reliable Solutions for Complex Tasks
infoCard.description: Our milling capabilities enable the production of parts with the highest precision and complexity. We use modern equipment that ensures impeccable reliability of the final products.

infoCard.title: Capacity for Large and Small Parts. In our equipment fleet:

list.description: Horizontal machines with quick table-changing capabilities
Portal 5-axis centers for processing parts up to 2000×4000 mm.

infoCard.title: Full Cycle Processing
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of milling services to ensure your project is executed flawlessly — from drawing to finished part. Thanks to our capabilities, we work efficiently without compromising quality.

infoCard.title: Additional Capabilities
infoCard.description: Our technologies are suitable for creating complex 3D structures for innovative projects and manufacturing simple and standard parts for a wide range of tasks. We handle any requests, regardless of complexity.

frezerniRoboty.callToAction: Start working with us today and experience the benefits of working with professionals!

termichnaObrobkaPage.title: HEAT TREATMENT
termichnaObrobkaPage.descriptionTop: We ensure high-quality metal heat treatment thanks to state-of-the-art equipment and an experienced team. Your products will gain the required strength, durability, and compliance with standards.
termichnaObrobkaPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for a reliable partner for heat treatment? We offer solutions that work.

infoCard.title: Strengthening and Durability of Parts
infoCard.description: We specialize in metal heat treatment that provides optimal mechanical properties for your parts. Our technologies ensure the required strength and durability.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive Service
infoCard.description: From initial processing to final refinement — we accompany each stage to ensure you receive a finished part of the highest quality.

infoCard.title: Specialized Technologies
infoCard.description: We apply advanced processing methods to create parts that meet the most stringent requirements and standards.

termichnaObrobkaPage.callToAction: Submit your request now, and your products will become a benchmark of reliability!

lazernaRizkaPage.title: LASER CUTTING WITH CNC
lazernaRizkaPage.descriptionTop: The laser cutting technology we use guarantees perfect precision and cleanliness of processing. We work with various materials, ensuring excellent results even for complex tasks.
lazernaRizkaPage.descriptionBottom: Your parts deserve the best quality. We will ensure it for you.

infoCard.title: Modern Cutting Technologies
infoCard.description: Our laser machines ensure impeccable processing precision, essential for complex geometric structures and high-precision tasks.

infoCard.title: Capabilities for Any Task
infoCard.description: We cut metals up to 20 mm thick and process large blanks. Process automation allows us to complete even large orders in a short time.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive Services
infoCard.description: You receive parts ready for further use, without the need for additional operations. We offer a full cycle of laser metal processing.

infoCard.title: Creating Functional Components
infoCard.description: Our technologies allow us to manufacture parts of any complexity, considering the smallest technical requirements and project specifics.

lazernaRizkaPage.callToAction: Order laser cutting from us and experience our professionalism in action!

shlifovkaMetaluPage.title: Metal Grinding
shlifovkaMetaluPage.descriptionTop: We offer high-precision surface grinding, achieving perfect smoothness. Our specialists and modern equipment ensure quality even for the most challenging tasks.
shlifovkaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Want perfectly processed parts? We know how to do it.

infoCard.title: Perfect Cleanliness and Precision
infoCard.description: We provide high-quality grinding to create parts with perfectly smooth surfaces and high precision, in accordance with your technical requirements.

infoCard.title: Extensive Equipment Selection. Our inventory includes:

list.description: Equipment for internal and thread grinding

infoCard.title: Complete Processing
infoCard.description: We take care of the entire processing cycle, ensuring you receive products that meet all your expectations and standards.

infoCard.title: Specialized Solutions
infoCard.description: We process non-standard surfaces and complex elements, ensuring they meet the highest requirements.

shlifovkaMetaluPage.callToAction: Entrust your orders to us and experience impeccable quality!

piskostruminniRoboty.title: Sandblasting
piskostruminniRoboty.descriptionTop: Effective surface cleaning from contaminants and corrosion is our specialty. Modern equipment and advanced technologies allow us to achieve the best results for various types of materials.
piskostruminniRoboty.descriptionBottom: Choose quality and professionalism for sandblasting. We are ready for your tasks.

list.description: Sandblasting for removing corrosion, dirt, and paint from metal and other surfaces
Shot blasting for processing metal parts that require intensive treatment
Laser cleaning for delicate and precise removal of dirt without damaging the surface

infoCard.title: High precision and efficiency
infoCard.description: Thanks to the latest technologies and air preparation systems, we provide maximum efficiency and precision in cleaning for all materials.

infoCard.title: Fast order fulfillment
infoCard.description: With streamlined logistics and powerful equipment, we complete orders in the shortest possible time without compromising quality.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of cleaning services, allowing you to receive finished parts without the need to contact other contractors.

piskostruminniRoboty.callToAction: Order sandblasting services with us today and experience our capabilities!

listOrderBenefits.title: Ready for large volumes – ensuring uninterrupted operations even for large-scale orders.
More than 300 CNC machines – modern equipment guarantees precision, quality, and speed of execution.
Flexible deadlines – we work quickly and always on time!

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.title: Manufacturing of Railway Infrastructure Components
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.descriptionTop: QPart specializes in the production of high-quality components for railway infrastructure. We ensure the manufacturing of various components that meet all modern safety and operational reliability standards.
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.descriptionBottom: Our solutions are suitable for both the modernization of existing systems and the construction of new railway facilities.

listServices.description: Modern equipment. The use of CNC machines guarantees high manufacturing precision.
Quality control. All components undergo verification to comply with international standards.
Flexibility in order execution. We work with both large batches and individual items.
Quick timelines. We ensure prompt production without compromising quality.

listPeculiarities.description: Tension bolts, anchor systems, support parts.
Metal structures for bridges, tunnels, platforms.
Specialized products according to customer drawings;

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.question: Need railway parts?
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.answer: We will produce them to your order, taking all requirements into account!

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.title: Production of Spare Parts for Agricultural Machinery
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.descriptionTop: Our company specializes in creating high-quality spare parts for agricultural machinery, considering the needs of farmers and the features of modern farming equipment.
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.descriptionBottom: We offer a wide range of parts suitable for various types of machinery, ensuring its uninterrupted operation even under the toughest conditions. Equip your machinery with high-quality spare parts.

listServices.description: Modern equipment. The use of CNC machines guarantees high manufacturing precision.
Quality control. All parts undergo testing to meet international standards.
Flexibility in order fulfillment. We handle both large batches and individual items.
Fast turnaround times. We ensure quick production without compromising quality.

listPeculiarities.description: Components for forage harvesting equipment: knives, shredders, shafts that ensure uninterrupted operation of livestock machinery.
Parts for loaders and manipulators: hydraulic cylinders, mounts necessary for reliable functioning of auxiliary equipment.
Custom parts: we manufacture bespoke spare parts according to specific customer requests.

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.question: Looking for spare parts for agricultural machinery?
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.answer: Order from us, and we will manufacture them specifically for your equipment!
